ejb-jar.description: This ejb-jar file contains assembled enterprise beans that are part of employee self-service application.

entity.description: The EmployeeRecord entity bean encapsulates access to the employee records.The deployer will use container-managed persistence to integrate the entity bean with the back-end system managing the employee records.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT o.stringField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.stringField = ?1
SELECT o.booleanField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.booleanField = ?1
SELECT o.charField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.charField = ?1
SELECT o.byteField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.byteField = ?1
SELECT o.shortField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.shortField = ?1
SELECT o.intField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.intField = ?1
SELECT o.longField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.longField = ?1
SELECT o.floatField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.floatField = ?1
SELECT o.doubleField FROM QueryData o WHERE o.doubleField = ?1
SELECT Object(o) FROM QueryData o WHERE o.intField = ?1
SELECT Object(o) FROM QueryData o WHERE o.intField = ?1
SELECT m.oneInverseSide FROM Order m WHERE m.id = ?1
